sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import CustomerDataService from '../../services/CustomerDataService'; function ViewInvoice(props) { const [invoices, setInvoices] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { getPosts(); }, []); // get invoices const getPosts = () => { axios .get("http://localhost:9191/api/invoices") .then((response) => { if (response.status === 200) { setInvoices(response?.data); } }) .catch((error) => { console.log(error); }); }; return ( <>

Invoice

:  {invoice?.invoiceName}

{invoice?.businessName}, {invoice?.businessCity}. Date:   {invoice?.invoiceDate}

From
{invoice?.businessName}.
{invoice?.businessAddress}
{invoice?.businessCity}, {invoice?.businessStateName} 444606
Phone: {invoice?.businessContactNo}
GSTIN: {invoice?.businessGstno}
State Code: {invoice?.businessStateId}
To
{invoice?.customerName}
{invoice?.customerAddress}
{invoice?.customerCity}, {invoice?.customerState} 444606
Phone: {invoice?.customerContactNo}
Email: {invoice?.customerEmail}
GSTIN: {invoice?.customerGstin}
Invoice : {invoice?.invoiceName}

Total Outstanding Balance: {invoice?.customerTotalOutBal}
{invoices && invoices.map((invoice) => ( ))}
Sr. No. Product Description HSN Code Rate CGST Amt SGST Amt IGST Amt
{invoice?.id} {invoice?.description} {invoice?.hsnCode} {invoice?.rate} {invoice?.cgstAmt} {invoice?.sgstAmt} {invoice?.igstAmt}

Amount Due : {invoice?.amountDue}

Sub Total : Rs. {invoice?.itemTotal}
Total item_tax: Rs. {invoice?.itemTax}
Total Billed Value: Rs. {invoice?.billTotal}
Grand Total : Rs. {invoice?.invoiceTotal}
Amount Paid: Rs. {invoice?.amountPaid}
Due Amount: Rs. {invoice?.amountDue}
); } export default ViewInvoice;
